meanings.definition: To cause to exist or happen; bring about
meanings.sent1: Eating healthy food makes you feel strong.
meanings.sent2: The sun makes the flowers grow in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand makes the rabbit disappear!
meanings.sent4: Kindness makes the world a brighter place.

meanings.sent1: The factory makes toys for children to play with.
meanings.sent2: The artist makes beautiful paintings that inspire others.
meanings.sent3: The chef makes a delicious cake for the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: Music makes emotions come alive in our hearts.
meanings.sent5: Hard work makes dreams become reality.

meanings.definition: To form in the mind; conceive
meanings.sent1: Imagination makes stories come to life in books.
meanings.sent2: Curiosity makes us wonder about the world around us.
meanings.sent3: Dreaming makes flying without wings possible.
meanings.sent4: Hope makes the future seem brighter and full of possibilities.

meanings.sent1: The strong wind makes the trees sway back and forth.
meanings.sent2: The teacher makes the students follow the rules in class.
meanings.sent3: The loud noise makes the cat run and hide under the bed.
meanings.sent4: Love makes us do things we never thought possible.
meanings.sent5: Fear makes some people freeze in place.

meanings.sent1: Working hard makes you money to buy things you need.
meanings.sent2: Studying makes you knowledge that helps you succeed.
meanings.sent3: Helping others makes you friends who care about you.
meanings.sent4: Saving makes you feel secure for the future.
meanings.sent5: Sharing makes you happiness that multiplies.

meanings.sent1: Mom makes delicious pancakes for breakfast on Sundays.
meanings.sent2: The chef makes a special sauce to go with the pasta.
meanings.sent3: The baker makes fresh bread every morning for the town.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of baking cookies makes the house feel cozy.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the grill makes everyone hungry for dinner.
